title: @@GORGEOUS 3/2 with Garage, Huge Yard, Two Level Deck!!
posting_body: GORGEOUS 3/2 with Garage, Huge Yard, Two Level Deck, Stainless Appliances, Washer/Dryer & More!

$1250/month Avail June 20 You will love this update at home that features a two car garage, hard surface flooring throughout (no carpet), granite COUNTERTOPS, Stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry, walk-in closet, and a BEAUTIFUL two level deck.
Enjoy the massive yard and BEAUTIFUL landscaping without worrying about the mowing, lawn MAINTENANCE is included.
This home is perfect for those looking for a place tucked away in, but also great for entertaining.
Excellent location close to Capital Circle Northeast, TENNESSEE St., and downtown.
*Cats and small dogs only, no ANIMALS over 30 pounds.
